function.name: quest_add
function.description: CRITICAL: Create a new quest/task whenever ANYONE (NPC or user) mentions something that needs to be done. This includes: favors, errands, requests, goals, tasks, objectives, jobs, missions - anything from 'get me a drink' to 'save the kingdom'. Track ALL requests and tasks, no matter how small. If someone asks for help or mentions needing something done, ALWAYS call this tool immediately.

title.description: Short, clear title for the quest (e.g., 'Find Danny's lighter', 'Clear the cellar rats', 'Get the merchant a drink')

giver.description: Who gave this task? Name of the NPC or 'Self' if the user set their own goal

description.description: What needs to be done? Include any relevant details about the task
